AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Average Student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Ahmislan average student. She does not need a description at all.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Music Club
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of a Ahmislan music club. She dreams of being a lead singer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Baseball Player
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Ahmislan baseball player. Her team has won the national campaign for five consecutive years.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Garden Club
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of a Ahmislan garden club. Her favourite are Stargazers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Cat Cafe
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an employee of a cat cafe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Sculpture Club
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Ahmislan sculpture club. Her best work is Sweat No.2VOPN. This piece bears an illustration of a missile. If you squint your eyes, the unbalanced composition of the image reveals the outline of a gourd.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Cooking Club
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Ahmislan cooking club. The club gets really busy before Valentine day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Karate Club
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Ahmislan karate club. She likes to have some juice after practice.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Outing Club
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Ahmislan outing club. She should have bypassed the camp of the cannibal tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Ahmislan Student Association
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a representative of a Ahmislan student association. Her duty is to enforce the discipline of the Ahmislan.
